trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Group" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Group" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />, and sets the event source of the templated toggle button to this <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" /> e define a origem do evento do botão de alternância com modelo para essa instância <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> control associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Expander".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém “Expander”.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="pattern" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, this method returns a reference to the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />, otherwise this method calls the base implementation on <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> which returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="pattern" /> for <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, esse método retornará uma referência à instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer" />; caso contrário, esse método chama a implementação base em <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />, que retorna <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the expander has automation keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o expansor tem foco do teclado de automação.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expander has automation keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o expansor tiver foco do teclado de automação; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The expander should have automation keyboard focus whenever the actual focus is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton>.
trans-unit.target: A expansão deve ter o foco do teclado automação sempre que o foco real é definido <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton>.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: The state (expanded or collapsed) of the control.
trans-unit.target: O estado (expandidos ou recolhidos) do controle.
